name: Potatoes Corruption
description:
Hi everyone.
This is my first real game.
It's a roguelike, where you can play as a potato knight, mage or a jungle warrior.  There are 3 areas with randomized rooms. Defeat the main boss in each area, to progress to the next.

The gameplay is around 2-4 hours depending on how good you are :D
 around 1 hour / area)

It might be a bit repetitive at the end, but I still wanted to share it. I had a lot of fun making it, and I learned a lot. I am happy how it turned out.
